sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_dict ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, dictmark tinyint not null, description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(name) );

create table sf_dict_item ( id char(32) not null, dictid char(32) not null, parentid char(32), text varchar(128) not null, codeno varchar(128), itemmark tinyint not null, createDate datetime, userid char(32), domainid varchar(32), description varchar(256), ext1 varchar(64), ext2 int not null, oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(dictid, codeno) );
